Romney edges out Santorum in Ohio race

Former governor also wins in Mass., Vt., Va., and Idaho votes

Mitt Romney eked out a narrow victory over former US senator Rick Santorum in Ohio's GOP presidential primary. (Boston Globe)
Analysis

The former Mass. governor's tight race with Rick Santorum in Ohio has only emboldened the former US senator. (Boston.com)
